citations.narrative:
There are no records of acquisition/inventory for the kittens and puppies born on the premises and still there at the time of
inspection. Complete records of animals facilitate the inspection process and enable the movement and care of animals
covered by the Animal Welfare Act to be evaluated. The licensee must make, keep, and maintain records or forms which
fully and correctly disclose all required information concerning each dog or cat purchased or otherwise acquired, owned,
held, or otherwise in his or her possession or under his or her control. The records must include any offspring born of any
animal while in his or her possession or under his or her control. To be corrected by 9 May 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(a)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
There are no records of acquisition/inventory for the kittens and puppies born on the premises and still there at the time of 
inspection. Complete records of animals facilitate the inspection process and enable the movement and care of animals 
covered by the Animal Welfare Act to be evaluated. The licensee must make, keep, and maintain records or forms which 
fully and correctly disclose all required information concerning each dog or cat purchased or otherwise acquired, owned, 
held, or otherwise in his or her possession or under his or her control. The records must include any offspring born of any 
animal while in his or her possession or under his or her control. To be corrected by 9 May 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
